definitions.definition: To get away from by cunning ; to avoid by using dexterity , subterfuge , address, or ingenuity; to cleverly escape from
examples: to evade the force of an argument

definitions.definition: To escape ; to slip away ; — sometimes with from.
To attempt to escape; to practice artifice or sophistry , for the purpose of eluding.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To get away from by cunning ; to avoid by using dexterity , subterfuge , address, or ingenuity; to cleverly escape from
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To escape ; to slip away ; — sometimes with from.
( intransitive ) To attempt to escape; to practice artifice or sophistry , for the purpose of eluding.
